blogPost.excerpt: A weekly updated collection of hand picked tweets specially tailored to save time and give great reading experience. Consider it as a new way to consume Twitter.
blogPost.body: A weekly updated collection of hand picked tweets specially tailored to save time and give great reading experience. Consider it as a new way to consume Twitter.
blogPost.title: Growth Tweets - Weekly-updated repository of tweets that matter
blogPost.author: Ankit Ghosh

localize.description: 每周更新的精心挑选的推文集，专门为节省时间和提供良好的阅读体验。把它当作是一种新的Twitter消费方式。
localize.tagline: 每周更新的重要推文库。

localize.description: 大量现成的库，让你更快地设计和原型化你的想法。超过250多个构件和150多个屏幕模板。适用于Figma, Sketch, XD。
